title: Bloomberg Markets: Riedel Sees Big Development for India
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Riedel Sees Big Development for India
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: David Riedel President/Founder Riedel Research Group Discussing investing in emerging markets and why India could be a big story for the next couple of years.
